views.markdown:
Version 1.2.8-1 - Fixes for some issues occurred on the last update. Version 1.2.8 - Added the option to Move the StatusBar Left. - Added the option to Move the StatusBar Right. - Fixes in the Preferences Labels Panel. - Improvements. Version 1.2.7
- Added the option to Show the Date on StatusBar.
- Added the option to Show the Time and the Date on StatusBar.
-(Thanks /u/GewoonDani).
Version 1.2.6
- Added the option to Show Mobile User instead of the Carrier.
- Added the option to Show Ever the Full WiFi Bars (just for just Cosmetic Purpose).
Version 1.2.5
- Added the option to Hide the Clock StatusBar on System Wide (Everywhere).
- Added the Label to Check Other Tweaks by Me on BigBoss Repo.
Version 1.2.4
- Added the option to Hide the StatusBar and the Leftover Space.
- Changes in Settings Panel Labels.
Merry Christmas! :-)
Version 1.2.3
- Added the option to Hide the Signal Strength Icon on StatusBar on LockScreen and HomeScreen.
- Added the option to Hide the Assistant Icon on StatusBar on LockScreen and HomeScreen.
- Added the option to Hide Not Charging iPad on StatusBar.


Version 1.2.2
- Added the option to Hide the Quiet Mode Icon on StatusBar on LockScreen and HomeScreen.


Version 1.2.1
- Added the option to Hide the Bolt Icon when charging on LockScreen and HomeScreen.
- Added the option to Hide the Green Color and Bolt Icon when charging on LockScreen and HomeScreen.
Version 1.2
- Added the option to Disable the Yellow Icon in Low Battery Mode.
- Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels.


Version 1.1.9
- Added the option to Always Show the Car Play on StatusBar.
- Added the option to Show the StatusBar Time on LockScreen.
- Now you can Donate Me with the New Label in Preferences Panel (thanks a lot).
- Small Prefs Labels Changes.
Version 1.1.8
- Added the option to show the StatusBar when pulling Down the Notifications on iOS 10 (thanks sinfool for the tip).
- Code Fixes.


Version 1.1.7
- Added the option to hide the Bluetooth Battery on StatusBar.
- Added the option hide the Bluetooth Headphones on StatusBar.
- Added the option hide the Call Forwarding on StatusBar.
- Added the option hide the Car Play on StatusBar.


Version 1.1.6
- Added the option to hide the WiFi Signal Icon on StatusBar.
- Added the option to hide the Liquid Detection Icon on StatusBar.
- Added the option to show the Hotspot Icon instead of WiFi on StatusBar.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia with the New Label in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Description in Prefs.
Version 1.1.5
- Added the option to hide the Teletype Icon on StatusBar.
Version 1.1.4
- Added the option to Fade the Clock and the Date on the LockScreen, (it is working for iOS 8, 9 and 10.)
The update includes the Tweak FadeClockDateonLock available from 11/04/2017 on my Personal Repository).

- Small Descriptions Improvements in Settings Panel.
Version 1.1.3
- Added the option to hide the Activity Indicator on StatusBar.
- Added the option to hide the Location Services Icon on StatusBar.
- Added the option to hide the Thermal Indicator on StatusBar.
Version 1.1.2
- Added the option to hide the Carrier Icon on StatusBar.
- Added the option to hide the Rotation Lock Icon on StatusBar.
- Added the option to disable Breadcrumb on StatusBar (normally it appears at the Top of the Screen when navigating between different Apps).
- Added the option to show the LTE Icon instead of 4G on StatusBar.
- Bug Fixes and Improvements.


Version 1.1.1
- Added the option to hide the Green Background Bar when Calling and FaceTime on StatusBar (Requested on Twitter).
- Added the option to hide the Bar in Most Apps on StatusBar (incorporation of NoBarInApps on my Personal Repository).


Version 1.1
- Added the option to hide the Blue Bar when Tethering on StatusBar.
- Added the option to hide the Sync Icon on StatusBar.
Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to hide the Alarm Icon on StatusBar.
- Small Code Fixes.


Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to hide the VPN Icon on StatusBar.
- Small Code Improvement.
Version 0.0.1-75
- Added the option to hide the Red StatusBar when Recording (incorporation of NoRedBar on my Personal Repository).
- Changes and Improvements.
Version 0.0.1-73
- Added the option to show the StatusBar on Switcher (iOS 10 only).
- Better iOS 10 Options Compatibility (thanks @Dani Winter for a word of advice).


Version 0.0.1-71
- Settings Optimization: now options are switched off by Default.
Version 0.0.1-70
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
- Code Cleanup.
Version 0.0.1-69
- Added the option to hide the StatusBar on the Notification Center.

Version 0.0.1-67
- Added the option to show the Small StatusBar on the LockScreen (the same size of the HomeScreen).
Version 0.0.1-65
- Added the option to hide the Airplane, the Bluetooth, the Location and the Battery icons only on the LockScreen/HomeScreen.
- Added the option to hide the Clock icon only on the HomeScreen.
- Some improvements in the Settings Panel.

Version 0.0.1-61
- Added the option to show only the clock on the StatusBar.
- Added the iPhone 6S iOS 9.1 full Compatibility.
- Optimized the description in the Settings Panel.

Version 0.0.1-57
- Added the 32-Bit full Compatibility.
- Code Cleanup.
Version 0.0.1-56
- Added the option to enable the White Fade Effect on the opening of the Apps.
Version 0.0.1-55
- Added the option to disable the native "Scroll To Top" action on the Notification Center.
- Added a Confirmation Button in order to respring the Device (thanks @OlyDJios).

Version 0.0.1-41
- Added the option to hide the StatusBar on both LockScreen and HomeScreen.

Version 0.0.1-34
- Added the option to fade the StatusBar also in the Apps.
- Added the option to hide the StatusBar only in the LockScreen.

Version 0.0.1-30
- Revised the Preferences Panel.
- Added Extras Section to the Preferences Panel.

Version 0.0.1-24
- Added the option to hide the StatusBar everywhere (in LockScreen, in HomeScreen, in Apps and in the Notification Center).
- Made a little change inside the Preferences Panel.
